title: Hyundai IPO aimed to further Indianise operations: Company official
description: Hyundai Motor India Ltd is preparing for a Rs 27,870 crore initial public offering. This aims to increase local involvement in their operations. The IPO will be open to the public from October 15 to October 17. This decision reflects Hyundai's growth in the Indian market and aims to invite investors to join their journey.
